#summary PyGTK, Python and PySQLite install instruction for RedHat 8
#labels Phase-Deploy

== PyGTK, Python and PySQLite install instruction for RedHat 8 ==
 #. GTK+
{{{
$ wget ftp://fr.rpmfind.net/linux/redhat/9/en/os/i386/SRPMS/freetype-2.1.3-6.src.rpm
$ rpmbuild --rebuild freetype-2.1.3-6.src.rpm
$ wget ftp://fr.rpmfind.net/linux/redhat/9/en/os/i386/SRPMS/fontconfig-2.1-9.src.rpm
$ rpmbuild --rebuild fontconfig-2.1-9.src.rpm
$ pushd /usr/src/redhat/RPMS/i386/
$ rpm -Uvh freetype*.rpm fontconfig*.rpm
$ rm -f *.rpm
$ popd

$ wget ftp://rpmfind.net/linux/redhat/updates/enterprise/3AS/en/os/SRPMS/XFree86-4.3.0-81.EL.src.rpm
$ rpmbuild --rebuild XFree86-4.3.0-81.EL.src.rpm
$ pushd /usr/src/redhat/RPMS/i386/
$ rpm -Uvh --nodeps XFree86*.rpm
$ rm -f *.rpm
$ popd

$ wget http://pkgconfig.freedesktop.org/releases/pkg-config-0.19.tar.gz
$ tar xvfz pkg-config-0.19.tar.gz
$ pushd pkg-config-0.19
$ ./configure --prefix=/usr
$ make
$ make install
$ popd

$ while read url
do
    file=$(basename ${url})
    name=${file%.tar.bz2}
    wget ${url}
    tar xvfj ${file}
    pushd ${name}
    ./configure --prefix=/usr
    make
    make install
    popd
done <<URL
ftp://ftp.gtk.org/pub/gtk/v2.6/glib-2.6.5.tar.bz2
ftp://ftp.gtk.org/pub/gtk/v2.6/atk-1.9.0.tar.bz2
ftp://ftp.gtk.org/pub/gtk/v2.6/pango-1.8.1.tar.bz2
ftp://ftp.gtk.org/pub/gtk/v2.6/gtk+-2.6.8.tar.bz2
http://ftp.gnome.org/pub/GNOME/sources/glade/2.10/glade-2.10.0.tar.bz2
http://ftp.gnome.org/pub/GNOME/sources/libglade/2.5/libglade-2.5.1.tar.bz2
URL

$ wget http://icon-theme.freedesktop.org/releases/hicolor-icon-theme-0.8.tar.gz
$ tar xvfz hicolor-icon-theme-0.8.tar.gz
$ pushd hicolor-icon-theme-0.8
$ ./configure
$ make install
$ popd
}}}
 #. Python
{{{
$ wget http://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.4.1/rpms/python2.4-2.4.1-1pydotorg.src.rpm
$ rpmbuild --rebuild python2.4-2.4.1-1pydotorg.src.rpm
$ rpm -Uvh /usr/src/redhat/RPMS/i386/python2.4-*.i386.rpm
}}}
 1. PyGTK
 {{{
$ wget http://ftp.gnome.org/pub/GNOME/sources/pygtk/2.6/pygtk-2.6.2.tar.bz2
$ tar xvfj pygtk-2.6.2.tar.bz2
$ pushd pygtk-2.6.2
$ ./configure --prefix=/usr
$ make
$ make install
$ popd ..
}}}
 #. SQLite
{{{
$ wget http://www.sqlite.org/sqlite-2.8.16.tar.gz
$ tar xvfz sqlite-2.8.16.tar.gz
$ pushd sqlite-2.8.16
$ ./configure --prefix=/usr
$ make
$ make install
$ popd
}}}
 #. PySQLite
{{{
$ wget http://initd.org/pub/software/pysqlite/releases/1.0/1.0.1/pysqlite-1.0.1.tar.gz
$ tar xvfz pysqlite-1.0.1.tar.gz
$ pushd pysqlite
$ python setup.py install
$ popd
}}}
